drug.drug_name: Procedure: Transperineal Biopsy without antibiotics prophylaxis
Procedure: Transperineal Biopsy with antibiotics prophylaxis

long_title: Infective Complications in Transperineal Prostate Biopsy Without Antibiotic Prophylaxis: A Prospective Cohort Study
prior_treatment_requirements: * All consecutive patients in participating centres receiving transperineal USG-guided biopsy for any indication including:
* Suspicion of CAP recurrence after radiotherapy
Exclude - * Recent suspected UTI within 1 month
Exclude - * Recent culture proven bacteriuria within 1 month
Exclude - * High risk of infective endocarditis (including prosthetic heart valve, congenital heart disease, or previous history of infective endocarditis
Exclude - * Incompetent or incapable of understanding the nature of the study or giving informed consent
short_title: Infective Complications in TP Biopsy Without Antibiotic Prophylaxis
summary: This study is a prospective cohort study to delineate the infective outcomes and incidence after transperineal prostate biopsy with no antibiotic prophylaxis, compared to the existing data on outcomes on patients receiving transperineal prostate biopsy with antibiotic prophylaxis.

dose_level.level_description: Procedure: Transperineal Biopsy without antibiotics prophylaxis
Procedure: Transperineal Biopsy with antibiotics prophylaxis
